assignment.title: Explore the Outer Banks
assignment.objective: Understand the geographical, ecological, and cultural aspects of the Outer Banks.
assignment.submissionInstructions: Submit a report summarizing your findings on the geographical, ecological, and cultural importance of the Outer Banks.

tasks.title: Geographical Research
tasks.description: Identify the most significant geographical landmarks.

steps.title: Research Geographical Features
steps.description: Identify the key geographical features of the Outer Banks using online resources.

steps.title: Document Ecological Significance
steps.description: Write a short report on the different species and ecosystems found in the Outer Banks.

steps.title: Cultural Exploration
steps.description: Create a timeline of significant cultural events in the Outer Banks' history.

checkForUnderstanding.question: What major cultures influenced the Outer Banks?
Why are the barrier islands important ecologically?
Name one cultural event significant to the Outer Banks.

subsections.title: Geographical Overview
subsections.content: The Outer Banks, a string of barrier islands off the coast of North Carolina, stretches over 200 miles. Known for its unique geography that separates the Atlantic Ocean from the mainland, the area is characterized by sandy beaches, dunes, and sounds.

quizzes.question: What are the Outer Banks primarily known for?

subsections.title: Climate and Ecology
subsections.content: The climate of the Outer Banks is largely mild and temperate, influenced heavily by the ocean. It plays a critical role in the ecology, supporting diverse wildlife including sea turtles and various shorebirds.

quizzes.question: What kind of climate does the Outer Banks experience?

subsections.title: Cultural Importance
subsections.content: The Outer Banks holds a rich cultural heritage that includes tales of pirates, shipwrecks, and early colonists. It's famous for the Wright Brothers' first powered flight in Kitty Hawk.

quizzes.question: Which significant historical event took place in the Outer Banks?
